title: Did Biden Block Giving Aid and Admittance to Vietnamese Refugees in 1975?
subtitle: Donald Rumsfeld’s book about the Ford administration, “When the Center Held,” recounts an interaction with then-Senator Joe Biden.
author: Nur Ibrahim
vclaim: In 1975, then-U.S. Sen. Joe Biden blocked aid to South Vietnam and did not allow admittance of Vietnamese refugees into the United States.
